EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron chest at position(4.5, -58.5)
- Iron chest (position(4.5, -58.5))

### Iron plate smelting at position(4.0, -60.0)
- Stone furnace (position(4.0, -60.0))

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting iron chests due to missing iron plates
- The agent repeatedly attempts to craft iron chests but fails because it lacks sufficient iron plates. Ensure enough iron plates are available before attempting to craft iron chests. Monitor the iron plate production and only craft iron chests when the required amount of iron plates is present in the inventory.

NAMESPACE
